item.title: About Me
item.description:
Who am I ?

I am a first-year Informatics Ph.D. Student at Pennsylvania State University, co-advised by Prof. Dongwon Lee and Prof. Sharon Huang. My research interests are in the area of Deep Learning and Computer Vision with a focus on Generative Modelling, Vision-Language tasks and 3D Computer Vision. As a member of the PIKE Research group, I am currently working on analyzing multi-modal based fake news generation methods and developing novel approaches for computer-generated fake news detection. I received my Bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering from SSN College of Engineering, Chennai.

My Skills

  • Programming Languages
    • Python
    • Java
    • C/C++
  • ML/DL Tools
    • OpenCV
    • TensorFlow
    • PyTorch
    • Scikit-Learn
  • Web Development
    • FastAPI
    • HTML/CSS
    • NodeJS
  • App Development
    • Flutter
    • Android App Development
